# Support

LC Desenvolvimentos is dedicated to advancing AI research, hardware, software, and innovative technological solutions. We provide various support channels to help researchers, developers, and users.

## Getting Help

### Documentation
- **Main Documentation**: [https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/docs](https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/docs)
- **Research Lines**: [https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/pesquisa.html](https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/pesquisa.html)
- **API Documentation**: [https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/api-docs](https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/api-docs)
- **Research Methodology**: [https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/methodology](https://lcdesenvolvimentos.github.io/methodology)

### Community Support
- **GitHub Discussions**: [Join our discussions](https://github.com/LCDesenvolvimentos/LCDev.GitRepoTemplate/discussions)
- **GitHub Issues**: [Report bugs or request features](https://github.com/LCDesenvolvimentos/LCDev.GitRepoTemplate/issues)
- **Stack Overflow**: Tag your questions with `lcdesenvolvimentos`

### Direct Contact
- **General Inquiries**: [lcdev@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br](mailto:lcdev@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br)
- **Research Collaboration**: [research@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br](mailto:research@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br)
- **Technical Support**: [support@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br](mailto:support@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br)
- **Commercial Partnerships**: [partnerships@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br](mailto:partnerships@lcdesenvolvimentos.com.br)

## Research Support

### Academic Collaboration
We welcome academic collaborations and research partnerships. Our research focuses on:

- **EffiQuant Nexus**: Quantum Computing Applications
- **ParamSpace Bridge**: Multi-dimensional Parameter Spaces
- **TaskTailor**: Adaptive Task Management Systems
- **CogniFlow**: Cognitive Flow Technologies
- **NeuroMimic**: Neural Network Mimicry
- **ArchSynth**: Architectural Synthesis

### Research Methodology
Our 4-step research methodology:
1. Rigorous Theoretical Formulation
2. Controlled Experimentation
3. Academic Reproducibility
4. Practical Application

### Collaboration Opportunities
- Joint research projects
- Co-authored publications
- Research methodology sharing
- Dataset collaboration
- Open-source contributions

## Technical Support

### Installation and Setup
- Follow our [installation guide](./docs/installation.md)
- Check [system requirements](./docs/requirements.md)
- Review [troubleshooting guide](./docs/troubleshooting.md)

### Common Issues
1. **Installation Problems**
   - Check Python version compatibility
   - Verify system requirements
   - Review error logs

2. **Performance Issues**
   - Check hardware requirements
   - Review configuration settings
   - Monitor resource usage

3. **Research Questions**
   - Consult methodology documentation
   - Review research papers
   - Contact research team

## Research Collaboration

### Collaboration Framework
We operate under a structured collaboration framework:

#### Step 1: Initial Contact
- Contact our research team
- Outline collaboration goals
- Discuss mutual benefits

#### Step 2: Proposal Review
- Formal proposal submission
- Research methodology alignment
- Resource requirement assessment

#### Step 3: Collaboration Agreement
- Terms and conditions
- Intellectual property agreements
- Timeline and milestones

#### Step 4: Joint Research
- Collaborative research execution
- Regular progress reviews
- Knowledge sharing protocols

### Academic Standards
- Peer review process
- Publication standards
- Reproducibility requirements
- Ethical research practices

### Open Science Principles
- Open data sharing
- Open code repositories
- Transparent methodology
- Community engagement

## FAQ

### General Questions
**Q: What is LC Desenvolvimentos?**
A: LC Desenvolvimentos is a research and development company specializing in AI, quantum computing, neural networks, and innovative technological solutions.

**Q: How can I contribute to your research?**
A: We welcome contributions through our open-source projects, research collaborations, and academic partnerships. Contact us for collaboration opportunities.

**Q: Do you offer commercial services?**
A: Yes, we offer consulting, custom development, and technology transfer services for industrial applications.

### Technical Questions
**Q: What technologies do you work with?**
A: We work with various AI frameworks including PyTorch, TensorFlow, quantum computing platforms, and custom hardware solutions.

**Q: Is your software open source?**
A: Many of our projects are open source. Check individual repositories for licensing information.

**Q: Do you provide training?**
A: Yes, we offer training programs for researchers, developers, and organizations interested in our methodologies.

### Research Questions
**Q: What is your research methodology?**
A: We follow a 4-step methodology: Theoretical Formulation, Controlled Experimentation, Academic Reproducibility, and Practical Application.

**Q: How can I access your research?**
A: Our research is published in academic journals, available on our website, and through our open repositories.

**Q: Can I collaborate on research projects?**
A: Yes, we actively seek research collaborations. Contact our research team to discuss opportunities.

## Support Hours

- **General Support**: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (UTC)
- **Research Support**: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (UTC)
- **Emergency Support**: 24/7 for critical issues

## Response Times

- **General Inquiries**: 2-3 business days
- **Technical Issues**: 1-2 business days
- **Research Questions**: 3-5 business days
- **Urgent Issues**: Within 24 hours

## Community Guidelines

When participating in our community:
- Be respectful and professional
- Follow our code of conduct
- Provide clear and detailed information
- Help others when possible
- Respect intellectual property
- Follow academic integrity standards
